title: 7 Crazy Fun Gadgets to Cook Your Eggs
author: Chino Valley Ranchers
content:
Christmas is just two weeks away and if you haven’t finished shopping for gifts, then we’ve got some incredible gift ideas perfect for everyone. Of course, we’re talking about gadgets that will take your egg-cooking experience to the next level.

1. Silicone Egg Molds

We don’t usually look to eggs as a means of creative expression, but with these cute silicone egg molds, your breakfast eggs will take the shape of an owl, a bunny, a kitty or a dog. Now you’ll never have a grumpy morning. You’re very welcome.

2. Egg Slicer

Save your chopping skills for the vegetables. This egg slicer will give you perfect egg slices in seconds, perfect for appetizers and sandwiches.

3. Egg Poacher

The egg poacher will finally help you make poached eggs with perfect consistency every time. These silicone egg poachers are BPA free, easy to clean and will turn your next brunch into a wild success.

4. Quick Egg Cracker

No matter how many eggs you’ve cracked in your entire life, chances are you get some egg shell in your frying pan every now and then. Though we don’t have a proven, scientific egg-cracking equation to help you out, what we do have is a bit better. This quick egg cracker is designed to help you crack raw eggs of all sizes, easily and efficiently.

5. Yolk Separator

It’s hard enough to crack open an egg without also trying to separate the yolk from the egg white. We’ve struggled with this ourselves and we consider ourselves eggs-perts. So we’d like to introduce you to the wonderful yolk separator that easily suctions the yolk from the egg white.

6. Microwaveable Omelette Pan

Microwaves have forever ruined us all. Why use a frying pan and a stove to make an omelette if all you need is a microwave and the Nordic Ware Microwave Omelet Pan. Easily cook 2-4 egg omelettes in just a few minutes!

7. Micro Egg Microwave Egg Cooking Cup

If you’ve ever felt guilty about microwaving eggs — don’t. Consider the microwave option an opportunity to better manage your time. The Micro Egg Microwave Egg Cooking Cup can make soft boiled eggs in 30 seconds and hard boiled eggs in 50 seconds.
